attributes.action: cut the price of gas and electricity for the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The old, hard worked British Citizens who have worked hard all their lives and now cant afford to pay their bills should not be going without basic amenities. Please try to understand that it is not easy for the working class, and they do have human rights and needs too. Why should they work hard to suffer by not having essentials.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
